actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1969, to prohibit the export of oil from the United States to countries other than Canada and Mexico.

summary.text: Prohibits the export of oil under the Export Administration Act from the United States to countries other than Canada and Mexico. (Amends 50 U.S.C. 2401)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1969, to prohibit the export of oil from the United States to countries other than Canada and Mexico.
